custom_margin_tablet=”-32px||19px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-32px||19px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

BUSH HOTEL IN MULDERSDRIFT GAUTENG

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FACILITIES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#5f6060″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. With a private bathroom fitted with a bath and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also have pool view. Guest rooms at 26 Degree South Hotel are fitted with a seating area

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” padding_top_bottom_link_1=”true” padding_top_bottom_link_2=”true” padding_left_right_link_2=”true” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/26D-South-67-of-132-1.jpg” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”30%||30%||true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ededed” custom_padding=”6%|6%|6%|6%” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”40px” header_line_height=”1.3em” max_width=”600px” custom_padding=”||27px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”25px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

CHOW BABY RESTAURANT 

Here’s some food for thought… From the peckish, to the ravenous, to the foodie, our restaurant – Chow Baby always hits the spot, spot on. With an exquisite menu to pick and choose from, you’ll always find something at our restaurant to settle your hunger and satisfy your taste buds.

Thirsty? Pull a chair at the Boho-Bar and wet your whistle with our exquisite selection of local beers and premium spirits. Grab a drink and watch the game or have some fun shooting pool with friends or colleagues on a funky L-shaped pool table in the Boho-Bar.

Whatever you are after, 26 Degree South has it all. Having a larger-than-life party? Getting married? Well then, our banqueting hall (150 people) might just be the function or wedding venue for you. Like they say, go big or Bush-Boho!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” padding_top_bottom_link_1=”true” padding_top_bottom_link_2=”true” padding_left_right_link_2=”true” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ededed” custom_padding=”6%|6%|6%|6%” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”40px” header_line_height=”1.3em” max_width=”600px” custom_padding=”||27px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”25px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

boho bar

26 Degree South isn’t your usual bush hotel venue. We do things our own way. Your way. The Bush-Boho way. What sets 26 Degree South apart is not only the vibe and the way we bring people and ideas together, but also our pride in creating a world-class holistic experience that will blow your mind without breaking your budget. This is why we’re the coolest hotel in Muldersdrift!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#83827C” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”Poppins|500|||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”16px” header_line_height=”2.1em” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/26D-South-70-of-132.jpg” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true” header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”40px” header_line_height=”1.3em” max_width=”600px” custom_padding=”||27px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”25px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SWIMMING AND CHILLING

26 Degree South is more than an African bush hotel and conference venue. It’s a destination that leaves the hustle and bustle behind. Where you can chill out, tune in our live it up. The unique blend of urban Jozi culture and the serenity of the African bush makes it the ideal wedding venue for those who want more than just the usual wedding experience. 26 DEGREE SOUTH OFFERS you quirky and vibrant spaces to host your CORPORATE EVENTS, YEAR END FUNCTIONS and PRODUCT LAUNCHES. Fun and spacious venues allow you to plan that perfect birthday party, host an exciting bridal shower, kitchen tea or a prize giving event.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#1bae8d” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://direct-book.com/properties/26degreessouthdirect?checkInDate=2021-01-20&checkOutDate=2021-01-21&locale=en&currency=ZAR&items%910%93%91adults%93=2&items%910%93%91children%93=0&items%910%93%91infants%93=0″ button_text=”CLICK HERE TO VIEW AVAILABLITY AND TO BOOK” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#1bae8d” button_border_width=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
